name: The Dekker Records: Thunder Stone Blues Pt.1
name_original: The Dekker Records: Thunder Stone Blues Pt.1
description:
The Dekker Records: Thunder Stone Blues Pt.1 has been remastered with improved graphics and gameplay, a mouse interface, and now available for Mac OS! Purchase once and get both formats!

Trailer

The player takes control of Dekker, a hard boiled detective called in to investigate a curious case. Thunder stones, a common means of resurrection familiar to every adventurer, have stopped working. Panic grips the city of Hammet as word spreads. After all, when you have an adventurer based economy, what do you do when your primary source of income dries up? It's up to Dekker to solve the case, save the city, and make it safe to crawl the dungeon once again.

  • An eclectic soundtrack captures the mix of noir cynicism and fantastic fiction.
  • Story driven gameplay in the best traditions of both Western and Eastern RPGs.
  • Retro sprites contribute to the nostalgic feel.
  • Classic JRPG style gameplay brings to mind the beloved games of yesterday.
